009package Ch17_EdgePreserving_Smoothing;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.BilateralF.Parameters;
017import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.BilateralFilterScalar;
018import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.BilateralFilterScalarSeparable;
019import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.BilateralFilterVector;
020import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.BilateralFilterVectorSeparable;
021import imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilter;
022import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
023import imagingbook.common.ij.IjProgressBarMonitor;
024import imagingbook.common.util.progress.ProgressMonitor;
025import imagingbook.core.jdoc.JavaDocHelp;
026import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
027
028import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
029import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
030import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
031
032/**
033 * <p>
034 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the Bilateral filter. This plugin works for all types of images. Given a
035 * color image, the filter is applied separately to each color component if {@code UseScalarFilter} is set true.
036 * Otherwise a vector filter is applied, using the specified color norm. See Sec. 17.2 of [1] for additional details.
037 * </p>
038 * <p>
039 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
040 * (2022).
041 * </p>
042 *
043 * @author WB
044 * @version 2022/12/12
045 * @see BilateralFilterScalar
046 * @see BilateralFilterVector
047 * @see BilateralFilterScalarSeparable
048 * @see BilateralFilterVectorSeparable
049 */
050public class Bilateral_Filter implements PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp {
051        
052        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
053        private static boolean UseSeparableFilter = false;
054        private static boolean UseScalarFilter = false;
055        
056        private boolean isColor;
057
058        /**
059         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
060         */
061        public Bilateral_Filter() {
062                if (noCurrentImage()) {
063                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Postcard2c);
064                }
065        }
066
067        @Override
068        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus imp) {
069                return DOES_ALL;
070        }
071
072        @Override
073        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
074                isColor = (ip instanceof ColorProcessor);
075                if (!runDialog())
076                        return;
077                
078                GenericFilter filter = null;    
079                if (isColor && !UseScalarFilter) {      // use a vector filter
080                        filter = (UseSeparableFilter) ? 
081                                        new BilateralFilterVectorSeparable(params) : 
082                                        new BilateralFilterVector(params);
083                }
084                else {                                                                  // use a scalar filter
085                        filter = (UseSeparableFilter) ? 
086                                        new BilateralFilterScalarSeparable(params) : 
087                                        new BilateralFilterScalar(params);
088                }
089                
090                try (ProgressMonitor m = new IjProgressBarMonitor(filter)) {
091                        filter.applyTo(ip);
092                }
093        }
094                
095        private boolean runDialog() {
096                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
097                gd.addHelp(getJavaDocUrl());
098                addToDialog(params, gd);
099                gd.addCheckbox("Use scalar filters (color only)", UseScalarFilter);
100                gd.addCheckbox("Use X/Y-separable filter (faster)", UseSeparableFilter);
101                
102                gd.showDialog();
103                if (gd.wasCanceled()) 
104                        return false;
105                
106                getFromDialog(params, gd);
107                UseScalarFilter = gd.getNextBoolean();
108                UseSeparableFilter = gd.getNextBoolean();
109                params.sigmaD = Math.max(params.sigmaD, 0.5);
110                params.sigmaR = Math.max(params.sigmaR, 1);
111                return params.validate();
112    }
113}
